item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi, I am Pulak, a senior year undergraduate at Indian Institute of Technology, Kanpur. I am daytime scholar majoring in Statistics and Data Science, and Economics; and, a nightime roboticist, embedded developer. Why the dissonance in my major and passion? So, back in high school, I was totally into economics, and apparently, I rocked at it! I mean, who knew econometric modeling could be so cool, right? Fast forward to undergrad, and I found myself falling hard for computers â€“ like, really digging into the nitty-gritty of how they work.
